original_text: The Lord is greater than all others. He lives high above the earth. He will cause Zion's people to do what is right and fair. The Lord is greater than all others.
korean_text: 여호와께서는 지극히 존귀하시니 그는 높은 곳에 거하심이요 정의와 공의를 시온에 충만하게 하심이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord is greater than all others
He lives high above the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 땅 위 높은 곳에 계신다

sentences.original_text: to do what is right and fair
sentences.korean_translation: 올바르고 공정한 것을 행하게 하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord is greater than all others
